glsa.title: PCRE: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in the PCRE Library, the worst of which may allow remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: The PCRE Library provides functions for Perl-compatible regular expressions.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in The PCRE Library. Please review the references below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition or other unspecified impacts via a specially crafted file.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All PCRE users should upgrade to the latest version:
Packages which depend on this library may need to be recompiled. Tools such as revdep-rebuild may assist in identifying some of these packages.
